text: avanāṇ sūryane prakāśamaṇiyiccat. candrane praśēābhippiccatuṁ avan tanne. atin avan vr̥d'dhikṣayaṅṅaḷ niścayiccirikkunnu. atuvaḻi niṅṅaḷkk keāllaṅṅaḷuṭe eṇṇavuṁ kaṇakkuṁ aṟiyān. yāthārthya niṣṭhamāyallāte allāhu iteānnuṁ sr̥ṣṭicciṭṭilla. kāryaṁ grahikkunna janattināyi allāhu teḷivukaḷ viśadīkarikkukayāṇ
